trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that identify an item of content.
trans-unit.target: 代表已排序的集合的<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>識別內容項目中的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a ContentLocatorGroup provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>ContentLocatorGroup 內所定義的元素提供結構化的方式來參考的外部資料的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改深層複本這個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 方法會建立可修改此複本會將複製的已凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，複製會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.` When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性會是`false`即使這個來源<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性是`true.`複製當複製相依性屬性時，會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （雖然它們可能不能再解析），但不會複製動畫或是目前的動畫值。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可修改深層複本複製這個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[註解結構描述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如結構描述的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: GetSchema is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: GetSchema 提供履行的合約<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>介面。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[註解結構描述](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md)如結構描述的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>構成此項目<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>絕對不會傳回集合`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>未包含任何<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>物件，傳回的集合將包含零個元素。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>構成此項目<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 還原序列化<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>從指定的<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: 用來還原序列化的 XML 讀取器<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .
